question:
What singer has had a Billboard No. 1 hit in each of the last four decades? 

 Pick the Options 

(1) Brian Wilson
(2) Mariah Carey
(3) Georg Solti
(4) Aretha Franklin

Which member of the Avengers had a brief stint as a pop star ? 

 Pick the Options 

(1) Brie Larson
(2) Johnny Cash
(3) John Mayer
(4) Mariah Carey

Who was the first woman ever inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame ? 

 Pick the Options 
 
(1) Mariah Carey 
(2) Britney Spears
(3) Adele 
(4) Madonna

Who, to date, has won the most Grammys of all time ? 

 Pick the Options 

(1) Marvin Gaye
(2) Georg Solti
(3) John Mayer
(4) Brian Wilson

What artists recorded two of their bestselling albums while they were behind bars ? 

 Pick the Options 

(1) Brian Wilson 
(2) Jackie Fox
(3) Bernie Taupin
(4) Johnny Cash
